name: Storm Island
description:
You stranded on an abandoned piece of land. From what you can tell, an all perishing storm is closing in and nothing near to seek shelter. There is still some time to react, so what will you do? Try to avoid the unavoidable or make use of the first uncertain chance to escape that opens up, knowing you could leave behind treasures beyond price. Solely your ingenuity can make the difference between a striving base camp working like clockwork or another lost poor soul at sea.

Features

  • Tactical Game
  • Survival Mechanics
  • Upgrade System
  • Treasure
  • And of course... Robots!
